AT.name: Conception II: Children of the Seven Stars
AT.description: Es ist Classmating-Zeit! Monster greifen Aterra an und es gibt nur eine kleine Gruppe an Personen, die die Macht des Sterngotts besitzen und sie bekämpfen können. Die Macht der kleinen Gruppe an Kriegern erreicht ihren Höhepunkt nur für einen kurzen Zeitrahmen. Die Lösung ist klar: Die Vereinigung der Sternkräfte, um magische Sternkinder zu gebären, die die Reihen der Kämpfer verstärken. Für Schüler kann es schwer sein, wenn man Dungeons zu erkunden, Monster zu bekämpfen UND gleichzeitig ein Teenagerleben zu führen hat. Lerne, deine Aktivitäten richtig zu verwalten, denn je stärker deine Beziehung zu deinen Klassenkameraden ist, desto stärker werden die Sternkinder sein! In diesem aufregenden JRPG kannst du Beziehungen zu 7 weiblichen Disciples unterhalten und 30 Klassen an Sternkindern haben. So musst du lernen, das perfekte Sternkind für jede Situation zu erschaffen. Du kannst das gesamte erste Kapitel spielen! Speicherdaten können auf die Vollversion des Spiels übertragen werden.

AU.name: Conception II: Children of the Seven Stars
AU.description: It’s time for classmating! Monsters have invaded the world of Aterra, and only a few special individuals, imbued with the power of the Star God, are equipped to fight it. With only a small group of warriors and a narrow window of time in which their powers are at their peak, the solution is clear: combine your Star power to make magical Star Children to boost up your forces in battle! The life of a student can be complicated when you’re exploring dungeons, fighting monsters, AND trying to maintain a high school lifestyle. Learn to balance your activities because the deeper the bond you have with your classmates, the stronger the Star Children you’ll make! In this stimulating JRPG, you’ll be able to create bonds with 7 different female Disciples and create 30 classes of Star Children, so you must learn how to create the perfect Star Children for any situation. In no time, you’ll have dozens of powerful kids with different skills that can take on everything the monsters throw at you.

BG.name: Conception II: Children of the Seven Stars
BG.description: It’s time for classmating! Monsters have invaded the world of Aterra, and only a few special individuals, imbued with the power of the Star God, are equipped to fight it. In no time, you’ll have dozens of powerful kids with different skills that can take on everything the monsters throw at you.

BE.name: Conception II: Children of the Seven Stars
BE.description: Il est temps de se faire des copains de classe ! Des monstres ont envahi la planète Aterra et seulement quelques individus spéciaux, forts des pouvoirs du Star God (Dieu Etoile) sont équipés pour les combattre. Avec seulement un petit groupe de guerriers disposant d’un temps limité pendant lequel leurs pouvoirs sont à leur maximum, la solution est claire : associez vos pouvoirs Star pour permettre aux Star Children (Enfants Stars) magiques d’augmenter vos forces dans la bataille ! La vie d’étudiant peut être compliquée, lorsque vous explorez des donjons, combattez les monstres ET essayez de vivre une vie normale de lycéen. Apprenez à gérer vos activités car plus vous êtes en relation avec vos camarades, plus les Star Children vous rendront fort(e) ! Dans ce JRPG stimulant, vous aurez la possibilité de créer des liens avec 7 Saintes différentes et de créer 30 classes de Star Children, aussi devez-vous apprendre comment créer les Star Children parfaits pour toutes les situations.

ES.name: Conception II: Children of the Seven Stars
ES.description: ¡Es hora de unirte a tus compañeros de clase! El mundo de Aterra ha sido invadido por monstruos, y solo unos pocos individuos especiales, impregnados con el poder del Dios de la Estrella, están preparados para combatirlos. Con un pequeño grupo de guerreros y un corto periodo de tiempo en el que sus poderes de la Estrella se manifiestan al máximo, hay una clara solución: ¡Tienes que combinar sus poderes para hacer Hijos de la Estrella y así incrementar tus fuerzas de batalla! La vida de un estudiante es complicada cuando estás explorando calabozos, combatiendo monstruos Y ADEMÁS tratando de mantener el estilo de vida de un instituto. ¡Aprende a equilibrar tus actividades porque cuanto más fuerte sea el vínculo con tus compañeros de clase, más fuertes serán los Hijos de la Estrella que hagas! En este JRPG, podrás crear vínculos con 7 Santas diferentes y crear 24 clases de Hijos de la Estrella, por lo que debes aprender a crear el Hijo de la Estrella perfecto para cada situación.

IT.name: Conception II: Children of the Seven Stars
IT.description: È ora del Classmating! Il mondo di Aterra è invaso da mostri, e solo alcune persone, pervase dall’energia del Dio delle Stelle, possono combatterli. Con un ristretto gruppo di guerrieri e un breve intervallo di tempo in cui i loro poteri sono al massimo, la soluzione è una sola: combinare le energie stellari per creare magici Figli delle Stelle e aumentare le forze in battaglia! La vita può diventare complicata quando esplori segrete, combatti mostri, e cerchi di mantenere una normale vita da liceale. Devi imparare a trovare un equilibrio tra le tue attività, perché più saldo sarà il tuo legame coi compagni di classe, più forti saranno i Figli delle Stelle che creerete! In questo entusiasmante gioco di ruolo potrai creare legami con 7 diverse Disciples e generare con loro 30 classi di Figli delle Stelle, perciò dovrai imparare a generare i Figli delle Stelle adatti ad ogni situazione. Puoi giocare tutto il primo capitolo! I dati salvati sono trasferibili al gioco completo.

NL.name: Conception II: Children of the Seven Stars
NL.description: Tijd voor Classmating! Monsters zijn de wereld Aterra binnengevallen en slechts een paar speciale individuen, voorzien van de kracht van de sterrengod, zijn in staat om ertegen te vechten. Met een klein groepje krijgers en maar weinig tijd waarin de krachten op hun hoogtepunt zijn, is de oplossing helder: combineer je sterrenkracht om magische sterrenkinderen te maken en zo sterker te staan in de strijd! Het leven van een student kan ingewikkeld zijn als je kerkers verkent, tegen monsters vecht én het leven van een tiener wilt leiden. Leer hoe je je activiteiten in balans houdt, want hoe sterker de band met je klasgenoten, des de sterker zijn de sterrenkinderen die je produceert! In deze opwindende JRPG kun je banden aangaan met 7 vrouwelijke Disciples en 30 klassen van sterrenkinderen samenstellen. Leer hoe je het perfecte sterrenkind voor elke situatie maakt. Speel het volledige eerste hoofdstuk! De opgeslagen gegevens zijn overdraagbaar naar het volledige spel.

PL.name: Conception II: Children of the Seven Stars
PL.description: It’s time for classmating! Monsters have invaded the world of Aterra, and only a few special individuals, imbued with the power of the Star God, are equipped to fight it. With only a small group of warriors and a narrow window of time in which their powers are at their peak, the solution is clear: combine your Star power to make magical Star Children to boost up your forces in battle! The life of a student can be complicated when you’re exploring dungeons, fighting monsters, AND trying to maintain a high school lifestyle. Learn to balance your activities because the deeper the bond you have with your classmates, the stronger the Star Children you’ll make! In this stimulating JRPG, you’ll be able to create bonds with 7 different female Disciples and create 30 classes of Star Children, so you must learn how to create the perfect Star Children for any situation. In no time, you’ll have dozens of powerful kids with different skills that can take on everything the monsters throw at you.

PT.name: Conception II: Children of the Seven Stars
PT.description: É hora de se unir aos colegas! Os monstros invadiram o mundo de Aterra e apenas alguns indivíduos especiais, dotados do poder do Deus Star, estão equipados para combatê-los. Com apenas um pequeno grupo de guerreiros e uma brecha de tempo pequena em que seus poderes estão no seu pico, a solução é clara: combinar seu poder Star para gerar Crianças Star mágicas e aumentar suas forças na batalha! A vida de estudante pode ser complicada, quando você está explorando calabouços, lutando contra monstros e, além disso, tentando manter um estilo de vida de aluno do secundário. Aprenda a equilibrar suas atividades, porque quanto mais forte for seu vínculo com colegas, mais fortes serão as Crianças Star que você gerará! Neste JRPG estimulante, você poderá criar vínculos com 7 diferentes Santas e criar 24 categorias de Crianças Star. Assim, aprenda como criar as crianças Star perfeitas para qualquer situação. Sem demora, você terá dúzias de crianças poderosas com diferentes habilidades, que poderão combater tudo o que os monstros colocarem na sua frente.

RU.name: Conception II: Children of the Seven Stars
RU.description: Время для Classmating! Монстры заполонили мир Aterra, и лишь отдельные личности, наделенные мощью Звездного Бога, в силах бороться с ними. Располагая небольшой группой воинов, надо так сочетать Звездную мощь, чтобы Звездные Дети удесятерили ваши силы в сражении! В этой японской ролевой игре можно наладить связи с 7 различными Disciples и создать 30 классов Звездных Детей, идеальных для любой ситуации. Вы можете пройти всю первую главу! Сохраненные данные можно перенести в полную версию игры.

SE.name: Conception II: Children of the Seven Stars
SE.description: It’s time for classmating! Monsters have invaded the world of Aterra, and only a few special individuals, imbued with the power of the Star God, are equipped to fight it. With only a small group of warriors and a narrow window of time in which their powers are at their peak, the solution is clear: combine your Star power to make magical Star Children to boost up your forces in battle! The life of a student can be complicated when you’re exploring dungeons, fighting monsters, AND trying to maintain a high school lifestyle. Learn to balance your activities because the deeper the bond you have with your classmates, the stronger the Star Children you’ll make! In this stimulating JRPG, you’ll be able to create bonds with 7 different female Disciples and create 30 classes of Star Children, so you must learn how to create the perfect Star Children for any situation. In no time, you’ll have dozens of powerful kids with different skills that can take on everything the monsters throw at you.

SK.name: Conception II: Children of the Seven Stars
SK.description: It’s time for classmating! Monsters have invaded the world of Aterra, and only a few special individuals, imbued with the power of the Star God, are equipped to fight it. With only a small group of warriors and a narrow window of time in which their powers are at their peak, the solution is clear: combine your Star power to make magical Star Children to boost up your forces in battle! The life of a student can be complicated when you’re exploring dungeons, fighting monsters, AND trying to maintain a high school lifestyle. Learn to balance your activities because the deeper the bond you have with your classmates, the stronger the Star Children you’ll make! In no time, you’ll have dozens of powerful kids with different skills that can take on everything the monsters throw at you.
